languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, астропатический хор получает сообщения о флоте пиратов, планирующем нападение на один из наших самых богатых экстракциумов. Полагаю, это вновь бандиты с "Неуловимого презрения". Их следующая цель — одна из планет системы Молчание Мер-Сегрит".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, астропатический хор получает сообщения о флоте пиратов, планирующем нападение на один из наших самых богатых экстракциумов. Полагаю, это вновь бандиты с "Неуловимого презрения". Их следующая цель — одна из планет системы Молчание Мер-Сегрит".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir has received word about a pirate fleet that is preparing to attack one of our richest extractiums. I believe it's the thugs from the Elusive Contempt again. Their next target is one of the planets in the Silence of Mer-Segrit."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, астропатический хор получает сообщения о флоте пиратов, планирующем нападение на один из наших самых богатых экстракциумов. Полагаю, это вновь бандиты с "Неуловимого презрения". Их следующая цель — одна из планет системы Молчание Мер-Сегрит".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir has received word about a pirate fleet that is preparing to attack one of our richest extractiums. I believe it's the thugs from the Elusive Contempt again. Their next target is one of the planets in the Silence of Mer-Segrit System."

"Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir has received word about a pirate fleet that is preparing to attack one of our richest extractiums. I believe it's the thugs from the Elusive Contempt again. Their next target is one of the planets in the Silence of Mer-Segrit System."

"Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir has received word about a pirate fleet that is preparing to attack one of our richest extractiums. I believe it's the thugs from the Elusive Contempt again. Their next target is one of the planets in the Silence of Mer-Segrit."

"Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir has received word about a pirate fleet that is preparing to attack one of our richest extractiums. I believe it's the thugs from the Elusive Contempt again. Their next target is one of the planets in the Silence of Mer-Segrit."

"Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir has received word about a pirate fleet that is preparing to attack one of our richest extractiums. I believe it's the thugs from the Elusive Contempt again. Their next target is one of the planets in the Silence of Mer-Segrit."

languages.text: “舰长大人，星语唱诗班收到了信息，说海盗舰队正打算袭击我们最富饶的采矿站。我猜，应该又是‘诡秘蔑视号’的渣滓，他们的下个目标是某颗位于梅赛格里特之默的行星。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir has received word about a pirate fleet that is preparing to attack one of our richest extractiums. I believe it's the thugs from the Elusive Contempt again. Their next target is one of the planets in the Silence of Mer-Segrit."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，星语唱诗班收到了信息，说海盗舰队正打算袭击我们最富饶的采矿站。我猜，应该又是‘诡秘蔑视号’的渣滓，他们的下个目标是某颗位于梅赛格里特之默的行星。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, der Astropathische Chor hat von einer Piratenflotte erfahren, die einen Angriff auf eines unserer reichsten Extractia vorbereitet. Ich glaube, dass es wieder die Gauner von der Flüchtigen Verachtung sind. Ihr nächstes Ziel ist einer der Planeten in der Stille von Mer-Segrit."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir has received word about a pirate fleet that is preparing to attack one of our richest extractiums. I believe it's the thugs from the Elusive Contempt again. Their next target is one of the planets in the Silence of Mer-Segrit."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, der Astropathische Chor hat von einer Piratenflotte erfahren, die einen Angriff auf eines unserer reichsten Extractia vorbereitet. Ich glaube, dass es wieder die Gauner von der Flüchtigen Verachtung sind. Ihr nächstes Ziel ist einer der Planeten in der Stille von Mer-Segrit."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, le chœur astropathique a eu vent d'une flotte pirate qui se prépare à attaquer l'un de nos extractiums les plus riches. Je pense qu'il s'agit encore une fois de ces bandits de l'Insaisissable Avanie. Leur prochaine cible serait l'une des planètes du Silence de Mer-Segrit. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir has received word about a pirate fleet that is preparing to attack one of our richest extractiums. I believe it's the thugs from the Elusive Contempt again. Their next target is one of the planets in the Silence of Mer-Segrit."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, le chœur astropathique a eu vent d'une flotte pirate qui se prépare à attaquer l'un de nos extractiums les plus riches. Je pense qu'il s'agit encore une fois de ces bandits de l'Insaisissable Avanie. Leur prochaine cible serait l'une des planètes du Silence de Mer-Segrit. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, el Coro de Astrópatas ha recibido noticias de una flota pirata que se dispone a atacar uno de nuestros extractiums más productivos. Creo que son los matones del Odio Escurridizo otra vez. Su siguiente objetivo es uno de los mundos del Silencio de Mer-Segrit».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir has received word about a pirate fleet that is preparing to attack one of our richest extractiums. I believe it's the thugs from the Elusive Contempt again. Their next target is one of the planets in the Silence of Mer-Segrit."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, el Coro de Astrópatas ha recibido noticias de una flota pirata que se dispone a atacar uno de nuestros extractiums más productivos. Creo que son los matones del Odio Escurridizo otra vez. Su siguiente objetivo es uno de los mundos del Silencio de Mer-Segrit».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、感応通信聖歌隊は、海賊船団が最も豊かなエキストラチウムの1つを攻撃する準備をしているとの情報を得ました。またエルーシブ・コントンプト号の悪党どもでしょう。彼らの次の標的は、メル・セグリットの沈黙の惑星のひとつです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir has received word about a pirate fleet that is preparing to attack one of our richest extractiums. I believe it's the thugs from the Elusive Contempt again. Their next target is one of the planets in the Silence of Mer-Segrit."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、感応通信聖歌隊は、海賊船団が最も豊かなエキストラチウムの1つを攻撃する準備をしているとの情報を得ました。またエルーシブ・コントンプト号の悪党どもでしょう。彼らの次の標的は、メル・セグリットの沈黙の惑星のひとつです」

languages.text: "Astropatik Koro'nun aldığı duyumlara göre bir korsan filosu, en refah ayıklayıcılarımızdan birine saldırmayı planlıyormuş Lord Kaptan. Kaçkın Kibir'le gezen haydutlar olsa gerek. Mer-Segrit'in Sessizliği'ndeki bir gezegeni hedef seçmişler."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir has received word about a pirate fleet that is preparing to attack one of our richest extractiums. I believe it's the thugs from the Elusive Contempt again. Their next target is one of the planets in the Silence of Mer-Segrit."
